For those who cannot view this file, all you need the K-Lite codec pack, which can be downloaded from  http://www.codecguide.com . Most of the movie files downloaded from the internet are compressed using xvid, divx or some other compression codec, to save space. Now, on to the file description!

Doctor Who - 505 - Flesh and Stone
Air date: 01 May 2010
Plot: The enigmatic River Song hurtles back into the Doctor's life but she's not the only familiar face returning... The Weeping Angels are back! The Doctor is recruited by Father Octavian to track the last of the Angels, that have escaped from the Byzantium starliner, through the terrifying Maze of the Dead. (Part 2 of 2)
